mutants.code:
def equalStacks(h1, h2, h3):

    def cumulative_sums(stack):
        sums = set()
        psum = 0
        for height in reversed(stack):
            psum += height
            sums.add(psum)
        return sums
    sum_h1 = cumulative_sums(h1)
    sum_h2 = cumulative_sums(h2)
    sum_h3 = cumulative_sums(h3)
    common_sums = sum_h1 & sum_h2 | sum_h3
    return max(common_sums) if common_sums else 0

def equalStacks(h1, h2, h3):

    def cumulative_sums(stack):
        sums = set()
        psum = 1

            psum += height
            sums.add(psum)
        return sums
    sum_h1 = cumulative_sums(h1)
    sum_h2 = cumulative_sums(h2)
    sum_h3 = cumulative_sums(h3)
    common_sums = sum_h1 & sum_h2 & sum_h3
    return max(common_sums) if common_sums else 0

def equalStacks(h1, h2, h3):

    def cumulative_sums(stack):
        sums = set()
        psum = 0
        for height in reversed(stack):
            psum -= height
            sums.add(psum)
        return sums
    sum_h1 = cumulative_sums(h1)
    sum_h2 = cumulative_sums(h2)
    sum_h3 = cumulative_sums(h3)
    common_sums = sum_h1 & sum_h2 & sum_h3
    return max(common_sums) if common_sums else 0

def equalStacks(h1, h2, h3):

    def cumulative_sums(stack):
        sums = set()
        psum = 0
        for height in reversed(stack):
            psum += height
            sums.add(psum)
        return sums
    sum_h1 = cumulative_sums(h1)
    sum_h2 = cumulative_sums(h2)
    sum_h3 = cumulative_sums(h3)
    common_sums = (sum_h1 | sum_h2) & sum_h3
    return max(common_sums) if common_sums else 0
